body.content:
Dear Sir,



Thanks for your mail.

I contacted you because I have decided to move from here due to the
political crisis that leads to ethnic killings.



Indeed we did not know each other and I know that it’s hard to trust a
stranger but the position of things here force me to search for an honest
partner through this internet medium.



I will get my visa and other travel documents but what I need first is a
sincere partner who will stand to receive my money first then I will
relocate to meet you for the investment project.



It’s my inheritance and I’m the rightful beneficiary.



I wait for your earliest reply.



With best regards,

Maryann

On Sun, Aug 8, 2021 at 8:04 PM <sasha@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Sasha
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
